# Tender Notice Announcement
## Facilities Maintenance and Support Services

### Summary

This is an Advance Procurement Notice (APN) for a potential contract to provide Facilities Maintenance and Support Services at the Dwyer Hill Training Centre, with security requirements. Interested contractors are invited to begin the security clearance sponsorship process for the required Facility Security Clearance (FSC) at the level of SECRET.

### Description of the Project

The job involves providing facilities maintenance and support services for approximately 125 buildings and associated utility infrastructure with a total gross floor area of 42,500 m2. Additional planned facilities and work may be authorized, including 20 new buildings with a total gross floor area of up to 99,000 m2.

### Scope of Work

The contractor will provide the following services:

1.  **Hard Services**:
    *   Building envelope maintenance
    *   Heating, ventilation, air conditioning and refrigeration systems
    *   Electrical systems
    *   Plumbing systems
    *   Door systems
    *   Fire detection and suppression systems
    *   Elevator and lifting systems
    *   Generators
    *   Security and access control systems

2.  **Soft Services**:
    *   Integrated pest management services
    *   Landscaping and grounds maintenance services
    *   Janitorial services
    *   Hazardous waste management services
    *   Range and training area services
    *   Environmental services
    *   Snow and ice control services
    *   Solid waste management

### Security Requirements

To be eligible for contract award, the contractor must hold the Facility Security Clearance (FSC) at the level of SECRET. Defence Construction Canada (DCC) provides an Industrial Security Program (ISP) for contractors to obtain this clearance.

### Sponsorship Process

Contractors interested in obtaining the required security clearance must submit a sponsorship request to DCC. DCC will review the request and communicate directly with the contractor to complete the sponsorship package. The package will be forwarded to the Contract Security Program (CSP) on behalf of the contractor.

### Bidding and Documents

The bidding process and documents are available on the Merx website. Fees may apply.
